name: Neo-CLI
desc: bash script for my day-to-day tasks

name: Nlp to Sql
desc: This was developed for the submission of codeShastra ( round 0), in a group of 4. Aim was to translate user queries in plain english to valid sql commands.
result: We made a nodejs rest server for translation. Using naive bayes classifier on the token we were are able translate simple queries like select, update, delete, etc. Qualified for the next round ;)
